moreAboutMe: I was born and raised in a small village in Le Thuy, Quang Binh, Vietnam. I studied at Ho Chi Minh University of Technology and graduated in 2023 with a bachelor's degree in Computer Science. I began my journey as a backend developer in 2022 and have since transitioned to a full-stack developer. I have experience with Ruby on Rails, React the most because I have been working with them for a long time. I always try to learn new things and improve my skills every day. Feel free to reach out and say hello!

description: Employment Hero is Australia's top cloud-based HR, payroll and benefits platform for employers & employees
I support them in maintaining and developing systems using key technologies such as Ruby on Rails, Sinatra, React, Redis, Sidekiq, PostgreSQL, GRPC, Kafka...
The company operates in the field of Ecommerce.
I support them in maintaining and developing systems on the backend side using key technologies such as Ruby on Rails, Redis, Sidekiq, MySQL, ElasticSearch
